trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式
Write-Warning
Write-Warning
概要
寫入警告訊息。
語法
描述

trans-unit.source: The **Write-Warning** cmdlet writes a warning message to the Windows PowerShell host.
trans-unit.target: **Write-warning** 指令程式會將警告訊息寫入 Windows PowerShell 主機。

trans-unit.source: The response to the warning depends on the value of the user's $WarningPreference variable and the use of the *WarningAction* common parameter.
trans-unit.target: 警告的回應取決於使用者的 $WarningPreference 變數的值和使用 *WarningAction* 一般參數。
範例
範例 1︰ 寫入一則警告訊息

trans-unit.source: This command displays the message "WARNING: This is only a test warning."
trans-unit.target: 此命令會顯示訊息 「 警告︰ 這是測試警告。 」

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Pass a string to Write-Warning
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 將字串傳遞給寫入警告

trans-unit.source: This command shows that you can use a pipeline operator (|) to send a string to **Write-Warning**.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會顯示，您可以使用管線運算子 (|) 將字串傳送至 **Write-warning**。

trans-unit.source: You can save the string in a variable, as shown in this command, or pipe the string directly to **Write-Warning**.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將字串儲存在變數中，這個命令中所示，或使用管線傳送字串直接 **Write-warning**。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Set the $WarningPreference variable and write a warning
trans-unit.target: 範例 3︰ 設定 $WarningPreference 變數，以及撰寫一則警告

trans-unit.source: This example shows the effect of the value of the $WarningPreference variable on a **Write-Warning** command.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範對 $WarningPreference 變數的值的影響 **Write-warning** 命令。

trans-unit.source: The first command displays the default value of the $WarningPreference variable, which is Continue.
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令會顯示為 Continue $WarningPreference 變數的預設值。

trans-unit.source: As a result, when you write a warning, the warning message is displayed and execution continues.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您撰寫警告時，便會顯示該警告訊息，然後繼續執行。

trans-unit.source: When you change the value of the $WarningPreference variable, the effect of the **Write-Warning** command changes again.
trans-unit.target: 當您變更的效果 $WarningPreference 變數的值 **Write-warning** 命令變更一次。

trans-unit.source: A value of SilentlyContinue suppresses the warning.
trans-unit.target: SilentlyContinue 的值會抑制警告。

trans-unit.source: A value of Stop displays the warning and then stops execution of the command.
trans-unit.target: 停駐點的值會顯示警告，則會停止執行命令。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the $WarningPreference variable, see about_Preference_Variables.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 $WarningPreference 變數的詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Preference_Variables。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: Set the WarningAction parameter and write a warning
trans-unit.target: 範例 4︰ 設定 WarningAction 參數，以及撰寫一則警告

trans-unit.source: This example shows the effect of the *WarningAction* common parameter on a **Write-Warning** command.
trans-unit.target: 此範例中顯示的效果 *WarningAction* 上的一般參數 **Write-warning** 命令。

trans-unit.source: You can use the *WarningAction* common parameter with any cmdlet to determine how Windows PowerShell responds to warnings resulting from that command.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 *WarningAction* 一般參數搭配任何指令程式可決定 Windows PowerShell 如何回應從該命令產生的警告。

trans-unit.source: The *WarningAction* common parameter overrides the value of the $WarningPreference only for that particular command.
trans-unit.target: *WarningAction* 一般參數會覆寫 $WarningPreference 只針對該特定命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command uses the **Write-Warning** cmdlet to display a warning.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 **Write-warning** 指令程式會顯示警告。

trans-unit.source: The *WarningAction* common parameter with a value of Inquire directs the system to prompt the user when the command displays a warning.
trans-unit.target: *WarningAction* 一般值為 Inquire 參數會指示系統命令會顯示警告時提示使用者。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the *WarningAction* common parameter, see about_CommonParameters.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊 *WarningAction* 一般參數，請參閱 about_CommonParameters。
參數
訊息
指定警告訊息。
CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。
如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。
輸入
System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a string that contains the warning to **Write-Warning**.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過管道傳送字串，包含警告 **Write-warning**。
輸出
無

trans-unit.source: **Write-Warning** writes only to the warning stream.
trans-unit.target: **寫入警告** 只會寫入警告串流。

trans-unit.source: It does not generate any other output.
trans-unit.target: 它不會產生任何其他輸出。
附註

trans-unit.source: The default value for the $WarningPreference variable is Continue, which displays the warning and then continues executing the command.
trans-unit.target: $WarningPreference 變數的預設值為 Continue，這會顯示警告，然後再繼續執行命令。

trans-unit.source: To determine valid values for a preference variable such as $WarningPreference, set it to a string of random characters, such as "abc".
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷喜好設定變數 (例如 $WarningPreference) 的有效值，請將它設定為隨機字元字串，例如 "abc"。

trans-unit.source: The resulting error message will list the valid values.
trans-unit.target: 產生的錯誤訊息將會列出有效的值。
相關的連結
Write-Debug
Write-Error
Write-EventLog
Write-Host
寫入資訊
Write-Output
Write-Progress
Write-Verbose
about_CommonParameters
about_Preference_Variables
